about_the_game:
Innertial invites you to step into a hyper-commodified future, where your actions shape the world around you. In this probability-based walking simulator, the rooms you explore shift and adapt to your behaviour, creating an individualized journey through ever-changing environments.

Relax to the soothing colors and sounds as all your needs are fullfiled! Use the Setter Cube as your reliable everything companion: set the room's color, reveals interactions, track you status, and much more.

Immerse yourself in this post-language world, where even the simplest routines are gamified, and your daily cycle becomes the puzzle to solve.
